00058 void SYSTEM_ChipRevisionGet(SYSTEM_ChipRevision_TypeDef *rev)
00059 {
00060   uint8_t tmp;
00061 
00062   EFM_ASSERT(rev);
00063 
00064   /* CHIP FAMILY bit [5:2] */
00065   tmp  = (((ROMTABLE->PID1 & _ROMTABLE_PID1_FAMILYMSB_MASK) >> _ROMTABLE_PID1_FAMILYMSB_SHIFT) << 2);
00066   /* CHIP FAMILY bit [1:0] */
00067   tmp |=  ((ROMTABLE->PID0 & _ROMTABLE_PID0_FAMILYLSB_MASK) >> _ROMTABLE_PID0_FAMILYLSB_SHIFT);
00068   rev->family = tmp;
00069 
00070   /* CHIP MAJOR bit [3:0] */
00071   rev->major = (ROMTABLE->PID0 & _ROMTABLE_PID0_REVMAJOR_MASK) >> _ROMTABLE_PID0_REVMAJOR_SHIFT;
00072 
00073   /* CHIP MINOR bit [7:4] */
00074   tmp  = (((ROMTABLE->PID2 & _ROMTABLE_PID2_REVMINORMSB_MASK) >> _ROMTABLE_PID2_REVMINORMSB_SHIFT) << 4);
00075   /* CHIP MINOR bit [3:0] */
00076   tmp |=  ((ROMTABLE->PID3 & _ROMTABLE_PID3_REVMINORLSB_MASK) >> _ROMTABLE_PID3_REVMINORLSB_SHIFT);
00077   rev->minor = tmp;
00078 }

00080 #if defined(CALIBRATE)
00081 /***************************************************************************/
00091 uint32_t SYSTEM_GetCalibrationValue(volatile uint32_t *regAddress)
00092 {
00093   int               regCount;
00094   CALIBRATE_TypeDef *p;
00095 
00096   regCount = 1;
00097   p        = CALIBRATE;
00098 
00099   for (;; )
00100   {
00101     if ((regCount > CALIBRATE_MAX_REGISTERS) ||
00102         (p->VALUE == 0xFFFFFFFF))
00103     {
00104       EFM_ASSERT(false);
00105       return 0;                 /* End of device calibration table reached. */
00106     }
00107 
00108     if (p->ADDRESS == (uint32_t)regAddress)
00109     {
00110       return p->VALUE;          /* Calibration value found ! */
00111     }
00112 
00113     p++;
00114     regCount++;
00115   }
00116 }
00117 #endif /* defined (CALIBRATE) */
